[Information]

Revamp your home décor with this pair of Thermal Grommet Curtain Panels in chic chevron pattern that will instantly give your space a contemporary update. Our innovative Thermal Insulated Curtain Panels are crafted from 100% polyester and feature blackout light filtration that assists in giving you a perfectly tranquil environment to rest easy and also reduce your utility costs by insulating unwanted light, UV rays, noise, heat, and cold. These functional curtains are constructed with blackout fibers interwoven to the curtains fabric, providing a layer of added insulation against light diffusion and outside temperature transfer for energy efficacy qualities. It is so easy now to darken a room for daytime sleep, movie watching, or to prevent sunlight glare, with our 100% Thermal Eyelet Top Curtain Panels.

Additional Information:
  • Material : Polyester
  • Color : Silver/White

entry.title: 2 Pack - 6" Rose Gold Mercury Glass Candle Holders - Honeycomb Geometric Candle Holders
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 28.99

[About]

1 Qty: 2 Mercury Glass Candle Holder
Material: Glass
Color: Rose Gold Exterior | Silver Interior
Style: Geometric Hexagon Faces
Height: 6"
Candle Holder Width: 7.5"
Depth: 6"
Top Diameter: 5"
Base Diameter: 5"
Opening Diameter: 4.5"
Glass Thickness: 1/2 cm
Premium Quality: Made from heavy, handcrafted, mercury glass
Unique Geometrical Design: Suitable for all styles: Modern, Contemporary, Eclectic or Vintage
Perfect for floral and candle displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Mercury Glass Finish

Glistening whimsy of mercury glass harmonizes with urbanity of contemporary style geometric construction in these gorgeous glass Candle Holders. Featuring sparkling splattered metallic mercury glass finish with quirky hexagonal design formation; these Candle Holders boast modern aesthetics and mystic metallic sheen.

Multi-Purpose & Versatile

Stunning to the look and impact, these glam mercury glass Candle Holders will instantly add pizzazz and glamour to your otherwise plain spaces. Perfect to glam your wedding or party tables up, these plush pieces can also elegantly be used to give your dining tables, coffee tables, kitchen counters, and even office desk a touch of regal air.

Sturdy & Durable

Heavy weight glass construction makes these beauties a sturdy and durable decorative accessory to be used indoors and outdoors with the same classy sophistication. Perfect to be used as standalone accent pieces, you can create epic party and wedding centerpieces by filling seasonal or silk flowers, candles, LEDs, and other accessories. Besides making breathtaking accent pieces, these geometric Candle Holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and as a house warming gift.

 

Additional Information:

  • Can put water, sand, and vase fillers
  • A great container for Wedding Reception or Garden Style Wedding Decor.
  • Makes a perfect and memorable gift!
  • Note: Exterior and Interior are mix of concave and convex protrusions
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

      • Each Candle Holder Size: 3"H x 2.75"W
      • Top Diameter: 2.75"
      • Bottom Diameter: 2"
      • Inner Depth: 2.75"
      • Thickness: 2mm
      • Note: Candles and other decorations are not included
      • For safety precautions we recommend the votive candle holders to be used with an LED tea light. However, regular tea light candles may also be used.
      • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Table Decoration

      Care Instructions:

      • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
      • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens

[Information]

Metal Flower Ball Stand

Sleek, Stylish, and Shapely! Fashioned from sturdy, finely polished gold metal and styled elegantly in a gorgeous flared shape, this shiny showpiece makes a luxurious Floral Centerpiece Riser, Candle Holder, Flower Ball Holder, and an ornate Floor Décor Accent. Standing 17" tall, this elevated beauty will extravagantly showcase your beautiful Floral and Candle Decoration without hindering your view and vision.

Candle Holder

Featuring a sleek solid stem tapered masterfully and splayed base and top, this spangled stand will add regal elegance to your Banquet and Party Tables, Guest and Wedding Tables, Backstage Decoration, Aisle Passages, and Floor Decorations. 

Multi-Use

The flared top is wide enough to gorgeously hold our Rose Pomander or Hydrangea Flower Balls, Box weed Foliage Ball, Pillar Candles, Bird Cages, LED Fairy and String Lights, Glass Terrariums, and other ornamentations. For a pure Imperial Look, pair this beauty with our Gold Metal, Crystal, or Ceramic Vases, Centerpiece Risers, Candelabras, Candle Stands, and Floral Pots.
